title: Split Fiction PS5 Game, Two-Player Co-op Action Adventure, 16+ PEGI Rating

all_images.alt: Split Fiction PS5 Game, Two-Player Co-op Action Adventure, 16+ PEGI Rating

raw_desc: EXCLUSIVE CO-OP GAMEPLAY: Experience a unique two-player cooperative adventure that can only be played with a partner, featuring dynamic split-screen action NEXT-GEN GRAPHICS: Immerse yourself in stunning visuals on PS5 with vibrant neon-lit cityscapes and diverse environments across contrasting worlds MATURE CONTENT: PEGI 16+ rating ensures content suitable for players aged 16 and above, with age restrictions applying to online features MULTILINGUAL SUPPORT: Includes multiple language options for both audio and text, making it accessible to diverse players DEVELOPER PEDIGREE: Created by Hazelight Studios, renowned developers known for innovative cooperative gaming experiences
